name: onCodeVerify
subject: Email Verification Code
body:
Hi {{name}},



Your email verification is required.



The Verification Code : {{code}}


ï»¿

name: onChangeForgotPassword
subject: Reset Password Link
body:
Hi {{name}},



Password Reset for : {{email}}



Reset Link




Please follow the link to change your password.



This is an automated email.

name: onChangeForgotPasswordFailed
subject: Failed to send failed password reset link

name: onFailedRecordNotification
subject: Failed Records Notification
body:
Hi {{recipientName}},


Your file upload contained some failed records.


Here are the details of the failed records:


{{failedRecordDetails}}



The detailed list of failed records is attached as an Excel file.


This is an automated email.

name: onUserCreatedSuccess
subject: User Created - Successfully
body:
Welcome to {{projectLabel}}

Hello, {{name}}


We are pleased to inform you that your account has been successfully created in our system. Welcome to {{projectLabel}}!


As part of our commitment to security, our platform is built on a Zero Trust security model, ensuring that all interactions are authenticated, verified, and continuously monitored to keep your data safe.


Please note that this is an automated message from {{projectLabel}}'s app, intended solely as a notification. You do not need to respond to this email.


If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to contact our support team at support@codebridgeapp.com.


Thank you for choosing CodeBridgeApp. We look forward to supporting your journey with us!


Regards,

The CodeBridge Ai App Team


This is a system notification from Project CodeBridgeApp implementing Zero Trust security.

© 2024 Code Bridge Sdn. Bhd. All rights reserved.

name: onUserCreatedFailed
subject: User Creation - Failed
body:
Notification from {{projectLabel}}

Hello, {{name}}


We are informing you that your account has been failed to create in our system. Notification from {{projectLabel}}!


This could be an attempt to login your account with out your approval. Please take action if this was not created without your knowledge.


As part of our commitment to security, our platform is built on a Zero Trust security model, ensuring that all interactions are authenticated, verified, and continuously monitored to keep your data safe.


Please note that this is an automated message from {{projectLabel}}'s app, intended solely as a notification. You do not need to respond to this email.


If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to contact our support team at support@codebridgeapp.com.

name: onUserLoginFailed
subject: User Login - Failed
body:
Notifications from {{projectLabel}}

Hello, {{name}}


We are informing you that your account login has failed in our system. Notifications from {{projectLabel}}!


This could be an attempt to access your account without your permissions. Please take the necessary action if this is the case. Please contact your administrator with the information below.


As part of our commitment to security, our platform is built on a Zero Trust security model, ensuring that all interactions are authenticated, verified, and continuously monitored to keep your data safe.


Please note that this is an automated message from {{projectLabel}}'s app, intended solely as a notification. You do not need to respond to this email.


If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to contact our support team at support@codebridgeapp.com.


Thank you for choosing CodeBridgeApp. We look forward to supporting your journey with us!
